Question: Linxura CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Linxura

Product: Linxura Smart Controller

- Compact puck-shaped smart home controller
- Compatible with multiple brands including Alexa, Sonos, LIFX, and Philips
- E Ink display showing up to four devices at a time
- iPod-style click wheel for easy navigation
- Long battery life of up to three months on a single charge
- USB-C port for recharging
- Supports up to 52 smart home devices
- Click wheel for device control and adjustments
- Wall mount available for convenient placement
- Priced at $99
